description.narrative:
The objective of this project is to meet the objectives of the UNICEF 2021 updated humanitarian appeal for Afghanistan and increased humanitarian needs protection as well as needs identified in the UNICEF’s revised 2021 Humanitarian Action for Children (HAC) – Afghanistan. Among the planned targets for UNICEF’s 2021 programme are:
- 500,000 children admitted for treatment for severe acute malnutrition - 858,000 children accessing educational services - 500,000 people accessing a sufficient quantity of safe water - 568,000 children vaccinated against measles

This allocation contributes to meeting the objectives of UNICEF’s updated humanitarian appeal for Afghanistan for 2021. The grant seeks to support the protection of children and women in humanitarian contexts.
Among the planned targets for UNICEF’s 2021 programme are: - 500,000 children admitted for treatment for severe acute malnutrition - 858,000 children accessing educational services - 500,000 people accessing a sufficient quantity of safe water - 568,000 children vaccinated against measles
UNICEF's annual reports are available here: https://www.unicef.org/afghanistan/research-and-reports
